tool_description: API to access real-time environmental data provided by citizens from senseBoxes deployed across the world.
title: OpenSenseMap API

api_list.name: get_boxes
api_list.description: Get information about a single senseBox.

required_parameters.name: sense_box_id
required_parameters.description: The ID of the senseBox you are referring to.

optional_parameters.name: format
optional_parameters.description: The format the sensor data is returned in.

api_list.name: get_locations
api_list.description: Get all locations of the specified senseBox.

required_parameters.name: sense_box_id
required_parameters.description: The ID of the senseBox you are referring to.

optional_parameters.name: format
optional_parameters.description: The format the data is returned in.
